New Records: Kyle Tucker moved past injured Texas star Adolis Garcia (100) for the AL lead in RBIs with 101
Key Match Events: Yordan Alvarez homered and Kyle Tucker added two RBIs to give him an American League-leading 101
The Astros scored five runs in the fifth to take a 7-4 lead
Jurickson Profar had three hits, highlighted by a two-run homer
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Astros bounced back after losing the opener to increase their lead over the Mariners in the AL West to 1 1/2 games
The Astros went to their bullpen early after starter Cristian Javier allowed four hits and four runs in just four innings
The Padres went 3 for 12 with runners in scoring position
Others: The Astros are just 36-35 at Minute Maid Park this season
